A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly\, really enjoyed this movie despite what \"die hard fans\" are saying. I grew up watching Star Wars and watching TLJ was a great experience. Was there wasted potential on some characters? Sure but we really got to learn more about the characters and backstory about what's going on this universe. I really feel like people disliked this film because all the theories regarding Rey\, Snoke and Luke were just wrong and people will be salty about it. I guess people just want the same predictable movies all the time. Just my two cents. 9/10.
